data.title: Where we are: Museum of Transport, Greater Manchester
data.meta_description: Discover Greater Manchester's public road transport history! Fascinating display of buses, coaches, trams & historic objects inside a 1930s bus garage. Period Tea Room and Shop, plus take a free trip on our buses on certain days throughout the year...
data.text:
Travelling to and from the Museum

We always recommend travelling to the Museum by public transport wherever possible. If you are travelling to the Museum on an event day, please check our event page.

Plan your journey

Greater Manchester public transport network maps

Find your nearest bus stop, Metrolink or railway station (Greater Manchester only)

Plan your journey by public transport

Train times and tickets

Metrolink travel information

Google Maps directions to the Museum

Bus

Buses serving the Museum

Bus services stopping at: Cheetham Hill Road / Queens Road bus stop

Bus routes and timetables

Live bus departures from stops near the Museum

Buses to Manchester: Cheetham Hill Road / Smedley Street - near Penrose Close

Buses to Bury: Cheetham Hill Road / Queens Road - Manchester Fort junction

Buses to Failsworth: Cheetham, outside Go North West's Queens Road Garage

Buses to North Manchester General Hospital: Cheetham, opposite Go North West's Queens Road Garage

Rail and Metrolink

We are approximately a 10 minute walk from Queens Road Metrolink Station. Travel by train to Manchester Victoria or Manchester Piccadilly, then change onto Metrolink and travel to Queens Road.

Train times and tickets

Metrolink network map and ticket zones

Turn left out of Queens Road Metrolink Station and walk along Queens Road. Cross Queens Road at the second Pelican Crossing and then turn next right onto Boyle Street and we are at the far end on the right, beyond Go North West's Queens Road bus garage.

Live Metrolink departures from stops near the Museum

Queens Road Metrolink

Car

Limited on street parking is available outside the Museum. At special events you may find it difficult to park near the Museum.
